TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceCursorTreeAdapter extends Android.Widget.CursorTreeAdapter

Docs.summary: A fairly simple ExpandableListAdapter that creates views defined in an XML file.

remarks.para: A fairly simple ExpandableListAdapter that creates views defined in an XML file. You can specify the XML file that defines the appearance of the views.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
